meanings.definition: The quality or state of being allergenic.
meanings.sent1: The allergenicity of the pollen triggered my allergies.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the allergenicity of different types of food.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character's exaggerated allergenicity to peanuts always made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume had an allergenicity that could make anyone sneeze uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The allergenicity of the cat's fur was so strong that even non-allergic people started itching.

meanings.definition: The ability to produce an allergic reaction.
meanings.sent1: The allergenicity of the medication caused a rash on my skin.
meanings.sent2: Doctors tested the allergenicity of the new detergent on sensitive skin.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's superpower was an unusual allergenicity to pollen, making him sneeze at the most inconvenient times.
meanings.sent4: The allergenicity of her jokes was so high that everyone in the room burst into laughter.
meanings.sent5: The allergenicity of the flowers was so potent that even bees avoided them.
